pages.text: A subclaim is a claim inside a claim. Subclaims have their own permission and group sets that override the parent claim they are in (no you cannot create a subclaim inside a subclaim). Subclaim permissions have an additional value 'default' instead of just true and false which simply redirects that permission back to the parent claim. To create a subclaim switch to subclaim mode via /flan switchMode.
Then use your claiming tool the same way you create a normal claim. Opening the subclaim menu and editing subclaim permissions requires you to be in subclaim mode too.
